content:
My name is Qixing Li. I am a part-time graduate student at the City University of New York(CUNY), my major is Data Science. Before that, I obtained a MBA from St John’s University in Business Analytics. I have strong interests in various tech stuff such as Data Science and Artificial Intelligence, I am always interested in learning more about state-of-the-art methods, and applying them to solve real world problems.
I am also into finiancial market and cryptocurrencies, I have some experience on day trade and forex.
Right now I am seeking a position where I can excel my skills and contribute my value as much as I can.

content:
Many people who use MySQL 8.0 might encounter the 1290 issue. I have done some research online and the method discussed in this post may help you to solve the problem.
 copy the code below to terminal and input the password to open MySQL:
/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql -uroot -p   On the right top conner click the serach icon and type terminal, in case you don’t know how to open a terminal. password is the one you login in MySQL, usually set up when you install it.   Copy the code below to check the directory:
SELECT @@GLOBAL.secure_file_priv;  if there is a null or / , open the file below:
/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.oracle.oss.mysql.mysqld.plist   open finder, then click command+shift+G together,paste the path. use an editor to open this file: ‘com.oracle.oss.mysql.mysqld.plist’. don’t have one? (download one such as vim,sublime,etc)  Copy the line below to the secotion ProgramArguments, Save and Restart Your Mac.
<string>--secure-file-priv=/usr/local/mysql</string>   go back to step 1 to check again, if you no longer see anything like null or /, then congratulation!  you need to upload your excel, csv or other files in this directory though:
/usr/local/mysql  Enjoy no more error code 1290.
  
Reference:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40561248/trying-to-import-files-into-mysql-5-7-16-got-error-code-1290-secure-file
summary: Many people who use MySQL 8.0 might encounter the 1290 issue. I have done some research online and the method discussed in this post may help you to solve the problem.
title: Get Rid of MySQL Error 1290 in Mac
